mapper.select: WITH ISO AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(WEEK_START, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS WEEK_START, TO_CHAR(WEEK_END, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS WEEK_END, TO_CHAR(WEEK_START, 'WW') AS WEEK_OF_YEAR_ISO, TO_CHAR(WEEK_START, 'W') AS WEEK_OF_MONTH FROM ( SELECT TRUNC(START_DT + LEVEL, 'D') AS WEEK_START, TRUNC(START_DT + LEVEL, 'D') + 6 AS WEEK_END FROM ( SELECT TO_DATE('2000-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 1 AS START_DT, TO_DATE('2023-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS END_DT FROM DUAL ) CONNECT BY LEVEL <= END_DT - START_DT ) GROUP BY WEEK_START, WEEK_END ORDER BY WEEK_START ) SELECT c.name AS c_name, c.cnum, COUNT(m.mnum) AS asRequestCnt, TO_DATE(WEEK_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEK_START, TO_DATE(WEEK_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEK_END FROM ISO a, machine m, center c WHERE m.assend BETWEEN TO_DATE(WEEK_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(WEEK_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND m.cnum = c.cnum GROUP BY WEEK_START, WEEK_END, c.name, c.cnum ORDER BY WEEK_START ASC

select c.name c_name,m.mNum,mc.name mc_name,m.assend from machine m, center c, machinecode mc where m.cnum = c.cnum and assend between #{week_start} and #{week_end} and m.mcode=mc.mcode and c.cnum=#{cnum} group by c.name ,m.mNum,mc.name ,m.assend order by m.assend desc

select count(*) totalcount, count(case when mcode='M01' then 1 end)as gateway, count(case when mcode='M02' then 1 end)as activesensor, count(case when mcode='M03' then 1 end)as doorsensor, count(case when mcode='M03' then 1 end)as firesensor from machine where mstatus='재고'

select m.* ,mc.name mc_name from machine m, machinecode mc where m.mcode = mc.mcode
and m.mstatus='재고' and m.mcode=#{mcode}
